title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Lakers disappointing season and what they need to remember about their historical success in order to turn things around. He explains why he's rooting for Duke basketball to win the National Championship in Mike Krzyzewski's final season as head coach. He tells you why he was right about Aaron Rodgers and wrong about Deshaun Watson. Plus, Fox Sports college football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to give his top prospects for the upcoming draft. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
